short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoids CurseForge links, replacing them with Modrinth links in Google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoids CurseForge and other Minecraft mod links (9Minecraft, Planet Minecraft, mc-mod), by adding Modrinth links next to them in Google search results.

It's open-source! Check out https://github.com/okunamayanad/modlinker
